# Heart Animation - Pulsing heart symbol
# File format: Animation definition for 8x8 LED Matrix
# Each frame line: 8 binary bytes (rows) + delay in ms

name=Heart
loop=true

# Frame 1: Small heart
frame=00000000,00100100,00111100,00011000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,100

# Frame 2: Medium heart
frame=00000000,01100110,11111111,01111110,00111100,00011000,00000000,00000000,100

# Frame 3: Large heart (full)
frame=01100110,11111111,11111111,11111111,01111110,00111100,00011000,00000000,100

# Frame 4: Medium heart (shrinking)
frame=00000000,01100110,11111111,01111110,00111100,00011000,00000000,00000000,100

# Frame 5: Small heart
frame=00000000,00100100,00111100,00011000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,100
